title: Music Man
description: As my first group project, we all assigned ourselves to our strengths. I chose to manage, play with new css tools such as Flex Box, and fix bugs that came along the way.
point2: Used HTML, CSS, Flex-box, and Javascript

title: Horticulture Quiz
description: This was my first truly challenging homework assignment. I was afraid I would not get it done in time, and I spent many more hours than usual figuring out how to get it working. I persevered, stayed up late, and drank too much coffee, and created something I am absolutely proud to put on display

title: Weather Dashboard
description: The Weather Dashboard assignment, though one of my exceptionally difficult homework assignments, was the first assignment where I really allowed myself to make the page my own. I used Flex Box for the first time to create stylish responsive page with its own unique flares.

title: Burger Eating App
description: This application will allow the user to devour submitted burgers they so desire, devour that burger, and then spit it right back up to be devoured any time they'd like. It has limited entertainment value, but a quick kick üòù

title: Handshake
description: This is an application focused on local businesses that might not have the ability to get their services noticed the way big companies can. This app allows small service businesses to add their information, get reviews, and connect with their community. This also gives clients the opportunity to find more affordable and local services right in their neighborhood.
point3: Javascript, JQuery, Google fonts, Bootstrap CSS

title: Work Day Scheduler
description: This app allows the user to keep track of their scheduling needs and gives the user indicators when time has passed for a certain deadline. Each task or appointment can be saved for the user.
point2: Local Storage used, Javascript, CSS, HTML

title: Gamer Dash
description: This app pulls from a library of video games and also the community can upload their own personal video games themselves.
